docs.abstract: Survey of health trends of '70s notes that decade was marked by unusually pervasive explosion of interest in good health through sensible living, particularly among educated and affluent (Special Section, America: The '70s and Beyond) (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: "Whose speaks on Health is sure of a large audience." Save for the grammar, this statement could be made today as well as in 1864 when, as Bruce Haley puts it in his book, "The Healthy Body and Victorian Culture," healthconscious ...
